subject: Question control plus control
description_text:
Hello, when will be the vam pro haptics be avaiable at aliexpress?

Also i got the simsonn plus x as anticipation for above vam pro.

I use atm simruito pedals, in asseto corsa etc the pedals input get recognized.
But the simmonnmanager says 0 input so i can't calibrate my pedals.

Can you please sell spare plus x loadcell sensors (throttle,clutch,brake).
I did read from multiple people that simjack pedals work fine, but arent those the same?

conversations.body_text: Hi Wouter van Mensvoort,  Have you already purchased the PlusX controller? If so, please use SIMSONN Manager version 2.0.8. After properly connecting the pedals, unplug and reconnect the USB cable. Then click the "Offset" button in the software to perform a factory reset. This should resolve the issue you’re experiencing.

Hi yes i got plus x contoller its bought via the aliexpress store.

with offset i get this:

[cid:e4da7f29-a970-4494-8ecf-a3713b2bedb4]

So it register pedals

But when i do calibrate it shows:

[cid:7d6de62d-2e89-4d25-9b97-23ea06755751]

there are no inputs there?
________________________________
Hi Wouter van Mensvoort,  When you press the pedal, is there no data output at all?

Hi yes,

In asseto corsa/iracing calibration it sees and diview aswell

but only the simsonn manager software not it keeps saying 0%:

[cid:03afa36f-5914-4e4f-8908-fbac615df8a1]
________________________________

Hi Wouter van Mensvoort,  Please unplug the USB and reconnect only the power cable. Check if the LED inside the control box lights up. Alternatively, you can install the remote support tool Todesk (no registration required). After installation, just provide your ID and temporary code, and I can assist you remotely.

Hi, im from the netherlands.
So there is a time difference.


i dont know when its the best time for the remote support?
________________________________
Hi Wouter van Mensvoort,    Can we do it now?

Hi yes,

ToDesk:
device ID:582 973 493
Temporary password:45pewj4f
